text: nirakarippavarkalai avarkalin kopattil mulkiyavare allah avarkalait tatuttu vittan. (Ipporil) avarkal oru nanmaiyum ataiyavillai. (Ella vitankalilum nastame ataintarkal. Intap poril nampikkaiyalarkalai allahve patukattuk kontan.) Intap poril nampikkaiyalarkalukku allahve potumanavanaka iruntan. Allah (anaivaraiyum vita) mikka palavanakavum, mikaittavanakavum irukkiran
